# Bleach Reiryoku Online — Website

**Official site for [Bleach: Reiryoku](https://github.com/ahhglass/Bleach-Reiryoku)** — a Bleach-inspired RPG mod for Hytale. News, team, FAQ, and project info in one place.

<div align="center">
    <p><img src="logo.webp" alt="Bleach Reiryoku" width="100%"></p>
</div>

---

### Purpose

- Present **BRO** (Bleach Reiryoku Online) and the Soul Reaper path in Hytale  
- Publish **news** and dev updates  
- Introduce the **Reiryoku Team** and link to **Discord**  
- **FAQ** and knowledge base for players and contributors  

---

### Stack

| Layer        | Tech |
| ------------ | -----|
| Framework    | [SvelteKit](https://kit.svelte.dev/) 2, [Svelte](https://svelte.dev/) 5 |
| Build       | [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/) 7 |
| Language    | TypeScript |
| Styles      | SCSS, fluid typography, breakpoints |
| Content     | [mdsvex](https://mdsvex.pngwn.io/) (Markdown for news posts) |
| Deploy      | [Vercel](https://vercel.com/) (adapter-auto) |

---

### Quick start

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

Open [http://localhost:5173](http://localhost:5173).  
Build: `npm run build` · Preview: `npm run preview`.

---

This site is a fan project for the **Bleach: Reiryoku** mod.  
Mod repo: [Bleach-Reiryoku](https://github.com/ahhglass/Bleach-Reiryoku).
